mapper.select: select * from member where member.memid = #{member.memID} and member.mempw = #{member.memPW}
mapper.insert: insert into member(memid, mempw, memnn, memtel, memmail) values(#{memID}, #{memPW}, #{memNN}, #{memTel}, #{memMail})
mapper.update: update member set mempw = #{memPW} where memid = #{memID}
